description: Film is in three parts with an introduction by Everett Shostrom:  Part 1 - Describes client-centred therapy as practiced by Carl Rogers. Shows his interview with patient Kathy and gives a summation of the effectiveness of the interview. Part 2 - Describes actualising therapy as practiced by Everett Shostrom. Shows his interview with patient Kathy and gives a summation of the effectiveness of the interview. Part 3 - Describes multi-modal behaviour therapy as practiced by Arnold Lazarus. Shows his interview with patient Kathy and gives a summation of the effectiveness of the interview. Includes an evaluation by Kathy of her therapy with Drs Rogers, Shostrom and Lazarus.
